Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Permits video lottery gaming in the town of Woodbury, Orange county; repealer
Summary: Permits video lottery gaming in the town of Woodbury, county of Orange; designates vendor fees; requires a mitigation agreement.
LawCode: Amd §§1612 & 1617-a, Tax L; rpld §54-l sub 5, amd §54-l, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to video lottery gaming in the town of Woodbury; and to repeal certain provisions of the state finance law relating thereto
